titleStmt.title: David's distress and deliverance a sermon on I Samuel 30. 6. preached at Edinburgh March 22nd. 1696. By J:W: minster of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, John, ca. 1654-ca. 1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Reid, at his Printing-House in Bell's-Wynd,

notesStmt.note: Includes a poem on last leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
